# simple_rmd_blog_site

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of simple_rmd_blog_site is to provide an example of a (quite
complete and not trivial) example o a blog site usign simple rmakdown
(i.e. w/out `{blogdown}`)


Site published at 

- site folder changed to `docs/` (default `_site/`) to be publishet
on githubs pages
- posts not in default `index.Rmd` file and tab
- RSS
- sharing icons
- custom images
- draft posts
- foote and side notes
- footer
- menus in header
- `{distill}` site/articles
